alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 8:23PM CST until March 04 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. .Recent heavy rainfall caused the Big Muddy River near Murphysboro to flood. The river has crested, but will remain above flood stage through the weekend, and much of next week. For the Big Muddy River...including Murphysboro...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING CONTINUES THROUGH NEXT FRIDAY MORNING, MARCH 4TH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. * WHEN...Until next Friday morning, March 4th. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 24.4 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested. It will remain above flood stage until next Friday morning, March 4th. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
